name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-msgext-action-preview-java
title: Action based Messaging Extension with preview using Bot Framework v4
shortDescription: This app showcases how to create cards in Teams Messaging Extensions using user input from a Task Module.
longDescription: This sample app illustrates the creation of simple cards in Teams Messaging Extensions based on parameters entered by users in a Task Module. Built with Spring Boot, it also demonstrates how a bot can send messages on behalf of users, enhancing engagement and interaction flow.

thumbnails.alt: Solution UX showing Action based Messaging Extension with preview using Bot Framework v4

references.name: Teams development videos from the community
